item.description: Jordan B. Kinder is a media studies and environmental humanities scholar and activist from what is now called northern British Columbia. He is a citizen of the MÃ©tis Nation of Alberta, and is currently a SSHRC-FRQSC Postdoctoral Fellow at McGill University in the Department of Art History & Communication Studies. Over 2022-23, he will be a Postdoctoral Fellow with the Mahindra Humanities Center at Harvard University. In Fall 2023, he will be an assistant professor in the Department of Communication Studies and Cultural Studies at Wilfrid Laurier University.
